derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French socialisme, from social (see social)

entry.def: Socialism is a set of political principles whose general aim is to create a system in which everyone has an equal opportunity to benefit from a country's wealth. Under socialism, the country's main industries are usually owned by the state.

means.word_mean: 1. a political theory advocating state ownership of industry
2. an economic system based on state ownership of capital

auth_sentence.content: His Garveyite belief in entrepreneurial capitalism shifted to socialism.

auth_sentence.content: And suggested that capitalism and socialism could never coexist.

stems_affixes.type_exp: = companion,表示"同伴[引申为社团,社会]",

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好交际的,友好的,合群的
stems_affixes.word_buile: soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+able能……的→adj.好交际的,友好的,合群的
soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+al……的→adj.社会的;交际的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 联盟,协会,社团;交往,联合;联想
stems_affixes.word_buile: associate[v.联合,结合]+ion表名词→n.联盟,协会,社团;交往,联合;联想
social[adj.社会的;交际的]+ism主义→n.社会主义
social[adj.社会的;交际的]+ity表名词→n.社交,交际,社会性

stems_affixes.value_cn: 社会;社团,协会,社;社交界,上流社会
stems_affixes.word_buile: soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ety表名词→n.社会;社团,协会,社;社交界,上流社会
soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ology学科→n.社会学
as加强+soci社团+ate表动词→结成团队→联合
con共同+soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ate使……→成为共同的社会
dis分开+soci同伴[引申为社团,社会]+ate表动词→伙伴分开,分离
